text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-bumetanide
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-ethacrynate
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-furosemide
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-torsemide

name: Valueset_LOOPDIURETIC
title: Loop Diuretic Drug Value Set
description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Loop Diuretic drug class (id: N0000175590).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
purpose: Provide Loop Diuretic drug class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
